mapper.select: select MID,MVideoID,MUserID,MContent,Mdate,UName as userName, VName as videoName, UImage as image,UIntroduce as introduce FROM messages m,videos v,users u WHERE u.UID = m.MUserID AND m.MVideoID = v.VID AND m.MVideoID = #{id}
